data.text:
We were on room no 713 we had a lovely stay , the hotel has lovely rooftop with nice bar, the location is very near to bus stops and train station easy access for eveything with westfield mall near 5min walk. 
Staffs were lovely, housekeeping lady was really sweet however can improve with breakfast didnâ€™t really enjoy . 
Do enjoy the rooftop bar and pool side with wonderful view.
data.title: Lovely stay at hotel SB glow

data.text: A lovely, clean and inviting hotel in a great location, half hour walk or metro journey from everything you could want. Comfortable rooms and lovely staff, with a special mention to Nestor, who obviously knew his stuff. Would definitely recommend to anyone who is visiting Catalonia. Thankyou for making our stay memorable and special.
data.title: Amazing place in an amazing city with great staff and a comforting environment

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Customer:
We are grateful that you have taken the time to share your experience with other users. We are very happy that you enjoyed it and we especially appreciate your mention of our team. We hope to welcome you again very soon at SB Glow.

Best regards
Guest relations Manager
owner_response.author: Marketing SBHotels

data.text: A lovely place to stay! Classy, friendly and entirely comfortable. Especially our waiter Nestor who provided the loveliest service. He was friendly and welcoming and had great standards. The room itself was beautiful - comfy beds and lovely pillows! Close to city attractions just a 15 minute walk to Sagrada Familiar and food close by. All in all a lovely stay and cannot wait to come back! Thank you
data.title: Amazing place!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Thank you very much Jessica!
We are extremely happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our team was able to participate in such a great experience. It is very nice to receive personal mentions of our team. Thank you very much and until the next visit to Barcelona.

Best regards
Guest relations Manager
owner_response.author: Marketing SBHotels

data.text: Stayed in the Superior Room with Terrace in early November. Hotel was nice, room was lovely. Cleaners did a great job. Massive thanks to the lad behind the bar each night, was very helpful. View from the rooftop is unreal. Great stay :)
data.title: Great Stay in a lovely hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Thank you very much for sharing your experience. The entire SB Glow team is very happy that you enjoyed your stay in one of our superior rooms and grateful for your mention of our staff. We hope to welcome you again soon so that you can enjoy our hotel and Barcelona again!

Best regards
Guest relations Manager
owner_response.author: Marketing SBHotels

data.text: Nice hotel and friendly staff, but ended up with a double bed that was two singles pushed together, so not the most comfy. And the gym is useless for anyone travelling for work, only opens at 8am. Restaurant was good.
data.title: Not bad, not great

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much Darren for your feedback. It is very useful for us and to be able to improve in the future. Regarding bed preference, although we take note of all requests, it is subject to availability. Thanking you again for your contribution, we hope to have a future opportunity to welcome you.

Best regards
Guest relations manager
owner_response.author: Marketing SBHotels
